headline: What BlackRock’s Potential $38B Deal Means for AES Shares in 2025
summary: If you’re keeping an eye on AES, you’ve picked an especially intriguing moment. After a bumpy year, which saw the stock trail more than 11.6% over 12 months, things have taken a sharp turn upward lately. In just the past 30 days, AES has surged 16.5%, and it’s up 3.6% in the last week alone. The momentum is hard to ignore, whether you’re weighing a new position or holding for the long term. Part of this renewed interest stems from some blockbuster news: major investment firm BlackRock’s...

headline: AES (AES): Evaluating Valuation After a 17% Monthly Share Price Rally
summary: AES (AES) has caught the attention of investors thanks to a recent move in its stock price. Shares have seen steady gains over the past month, rising about 17%. This performance puts the stock well above many utility peers. See our latest analysis for AES. That upward momentum isn't just a blip. AES has notched a 16.6% share price return over the past month, capping off several months of recovery after last year's rough patch, even though its one-year total shareholder return remains...
